/circle6 Th erapeutic dose:  If a woman is anaemic (haemoglobin less than 11 g/dl) or has pallor, 
she needs two IFA tablets per day for three months. Th is means that a pregnant woman 
with anaemia needs to take at least 200 tablets of IFA. Th i
